SEARCH
Package sprite

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
core.Shape
core.Rectangle
sprite.Sprite
Direct Known Subclasses:
Block, Equipment, Gambledorf
public class Sprite extends Rectangle
Represents any object that moves and is affected by gravity
